title: Directs the division of criminal justice services to establish a methamphetamine manufacturer registry
summary: Directs the division of criminal justice services to establish a methamphetamine manufacturer registry of persons convicted of crimes involving the manufacture of methamphetamine which would be available to the public via a web site.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         1639

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 11, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by M. of A. DINOWITZ, GUNTHER, LUPARDO, GALEF, MAISEL, WEIS-
         ENBERG, CLARK -- Multi-Sponsored by  --  M.  of  A.  BOYLAND,  CROUCH,
         FINCH,  GIGLIO, P. LOPEZ, MARKEY, MAYERSOHN, McENENY, McKEVITT, SPANO,
         SWEENEY -- read once and referred to  the  Committee  on  Governmental
         Operations

       AN  ACT  to amend the executive law, in relation to establishing a meth-
         amphetamine manufacturer registry

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section  1.  Short  title. This act shall be known and may be cited as
    2  the "methamphetamine manufacturer registry act".
    3    S 2. The executive law is amended by adding a  new  section  837-s  to
    4  read as follows:
    5    S  837-S.  METHAMPHETAMINE  MANUFACTURER REGISTRY. 1. (A) THE DIVISION
    6  SHALL ESTABLISH AND MAINTAIN A METHAMPHETAMINE MANUFACTURER REGISTRY FOR
    7  THE PURPOSE OF IDENTIFYING PERSONS CONVICTED OF MANUFACTURING METHAMPHE-
    8  TAMINE, AS SET FORTH IN SUBDIVISION TWO OF THIS SECTION. THE  METHAMPHE-
    9  TAMINE  MANUFACTURER REGISTRY SHALL CONTAIN SUCH INDIVIDUAL'S NAME, DATE
   10  OF BIRTH, OFFENSE OR OFFENSES REQUIRING INCLUSION IN THE METHAMPHETAMINE
   11  MANUFACTURER REGISTRY, THE CONVICTION  DATE  AND  COUNTY  OF  EACH  SUCH
   12  OFFENSE,  AND  SUCH  OTHER IDENTIFYING INFORMATION AS THE DIVISION DEEMS
   13  NECESSARY TO IDENTIFY SUCH INDIVIDUAL, BUT SHALL NOT INCLUDE THE  SOCIAL
   14  SECURITY NUMBER OF SUCH PERSON.
   15    (B)  THE DIVISION SHALL MAKE THE INFORMATION CONTAINED IN THE REGISTRY
   16  ACCESSIBLE TO THE PUBLIC AND ON  THE  INTERNET  THROUGH  THE  DIVISION'S
   17  WEBSITE. THE DIVISION SHALL UPDATE INFORMATION AS IT DEEMS NECESSARY.
   18    (C)  THE  DIVISION SHALL PROMULGATE RULES AND REGULATIONS NECESSARY TO
   19  IMPLEMENT THIS SECTION WHICH SHALL INCLUDE PROCEDURES TO ENSURE THAT THE
   20  INFORMATION IN THE REGISTRY IS ACCURATE, AND THAT THE INFORMATION IN THE
   21  REGISTRY REFLECTS ANY CHANGES BASED ON THE REVERSAL OF A CONVICTION  FOR
   22  AN  OFFENSE  REQUIRING  INCLUSION  IN  THE  METHAMPHETAMINE MANUFACTURER

        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD04474-01-1

       A. 1639                             2

    1  REGISTRY, OR A COURT ORDER  REQUIRING  THE  SEALING  OR  EXPUNGEMENT  OF
    2  RECORDS RELATING TO THE OFFENSE. A CERTIFIED COPY OF SUCH AN ORDER SHALL
    3  BE  DEEMED  PRIMA  FACIE  TRUE  AND  CORRECT AND, SHALL BE SUFFICIENT TO
    4  REQUIRE  THE  IMMEDIATE AMENDMENT OR REMOVAL OF ANY PERSON'S INFORMATION
    5  FROM THE REGISTRY.
    6    2. FOR THE PURPOSES OF THIS SECTION A  "METHAMPHETAMINE  MANUFACTURER"
    7  SHALL  MEAN A PERSON CONVICTED OF ANY OF THE FOLLOWING OFFENSES:  CRIMI-
    8  NAL POSSESSION OF METHAMPHETAMINE MANUFACTURING MATERIAL IN  THE  SECOND
    9  DEGREE  (220.70);  CRIMINAL  POSSESSION OF METHAMPHETAMINE MANUFACTURING
   10  MATERIAL IN THE FIRST DEGREE (220.71); CRIMINAL POSSESSION OF PRECURSORS
   11  OF METHAMPHETAMINE (220.72); UNLAWFUL MANUFACTURE OF METHAMPHETAMINE  IN
   12  THE  THIRD  DEGREE  (220.73); UNLAWFUL MANUFACTURE OF METHAMPHETAMINE IN
   13  THE SECOND DEGREE (220.74); UNLAWFUL MANUFACTURE OF  METHAMPHETAMINE  IN
   14  THE  FIRST  DEGREE  (220.75);  AND  UNLAWFUL DISPOSAL OF METHAMPHETAMINE
   15  LABORATORY MATERIAL (220.76) OF THE PENAL LAW.
   16    3. (A) ANY COURT  CLERK  OF  A  COURT  HAVING  JURISDICTION  OVER  THE
   17  OFFENSES  ENUMERATED  IN  SUBDIVISION  TWO OF THIS SECTION SHALL FORWARD
   18  MONTHLY TO THE DIVISION A COPY OF THE JUDGMENT FOR ANY PERSON  CONVICTED
   19  OF  AN OFFENSE WITHIN THE DEFINITION OF METHAMPHETAMINE MANUFACTURER, AS
   20  SET FORTH IN SUBDIVISION TWO OF THIS SECTION DURING THE PREVIOUS MONTH.
   21    (B) WITHIN ONE HUNDRED TWENTY DAYS AFTER THE EFFECTIVE  DATE  OF  THIS
   22  SECTION,  THE COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTIONAL SERVICES SHALL FORWARD TO THE
   23  DIVISION A LIST OF ALL PERSONS INCARCERATED OR ON PAROLE OR POST-RELEASE
   24  SUPERVISION, WHO HAVE BEEN CONVICTED OF AN OFFENSE WITHIN THE DEFINITION
   25  OF METHAMPHETAMINE MANUFACTURER, AS SET FORTH IN SUBDIVISION TWO OF THIS
   26  SECTION.
   27    4. THE DIVISION SHALL ALSO ESTABLISH A PUBLIC  AWARENESS  CAMPAIGN  TO
   28  ADVISE THE PUBLIC OF THE PROVISIONS OF THIS SECTION.
   29    S 3. This act shall take effect immediately.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to establishing a methamphetamine manufacturer registry
